title: E131 IMPAULSIVE’S FIRST BILLIONAIRE: TILMAN FERTITTA - IMPAULSIVE EP. 131
itunes:title: IMPAULSIVE’S FIRST BILLIONAIRE: TILMAN FERTITTA - IMPAULSIVE EP. 131
description:
With a net worth of $4.8B (yes, that’s a B), Tilman Fertitta is an American businessman and television personality. He is the chairman, CEO, and sole owner of Landry's, Inc., one of the largest restaurant corporations in the USA. He also owns the Houston Rockets and everything else you will ever want in your life. But how did he do it? Find out on today’s episode of IMPAULSIVE...

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
